divs: Sighting Detailsi was in my kitchen on the phone talking to my old friend when i looked out the window...i then seen over by sylvan lake a strange light hovering over the tree tops about amile or so away from my home.i watched it for a while.at first i thought is was a plane seeing as the airport isn't far from here but it didn't move.it was bright and orange in color.kinda strange but fascinating...then disappeared
Summary: looking ot my window i noticed a bright orange light that hovered.didn't move then disappered
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Keego Harbor
There were no other sightings in Keego Harbor on or around March 8th 2013
